## whitespace variable

Matcher for single whitespace characters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
whitespace: <C, R>(success?: LitCallback<string, C, R> | undefined, fail?: LitCallback<string, C, R> | undefined) => Matcher<string, C, R>
```
